nodes.text: Daldom was the language of the Elnacon species. The Elnacon Dava Cassamam spoke in Daldom while playing sabacc in the Lodge on the planet Vandor in 10 BBY.

Daldom first appeared in the 2018 Anthology Series film, Solo: A Star Wars Story. It was first identified as Daldom in the video "Every Language in Star Wars" which released in 2019 on the Star Wars Kids YouTube channel.
